thread.title: BRIEF-Sabre Reports Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share From Continuing Operations Of $0.44

title: BRIEF-Sabre Reports Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share From Continuing Operations Of $0.44
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:46 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Sabre Reports Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share From Continuing Operations Of $0.44 Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Sabre Corp:
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32
* RAISED FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* CONSOLIDATED Q1 REVENUE INCREASED 8.0% TO $988.4 MILLION, COMPARED TO $915.4 MILLION IN YEAR AGO PERIOD
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.41, REVENUE VIEW $942.7 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 REVENUE $3,760 MILLION - $3,840 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EPS $1.39 - $1.53
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES (GAAP) $290 MILLION - $310 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 FREE CASH FLOW APPROXIMATELY $425 MILLION
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.42, REVENUE VIEW $3.74 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text: ( bit.ly/2jifMGv ) Further company coverage:
